name: Glace
description: Glace is a side-scrolling platform game designed by Tommy Visic.  You play as Glace, a failed experiment by Dr. Slagg and Dr. Frog .  The scientists' order their henchbots to take you to a rocket headed towards the sun.  The rocket malfunctions and you land on a planet.  On this planet, you meet someone named Essy and he tells you about magic beads .  Dr. Slagg and Dr. Frog are also after these magic beads, and they soon track you down after recieving an alert from one of their henchbots that the beads have been found.  Your job is to find all four beads before Dr. Slagg and Dr. Frog.
